name: SLIC3R
bio: SLIC3R is a San Francisco Bay Area based EDM and Open Format DJ and producer with over 12 years of experience. Playing many bars, clubs, and venues throughout SF such as F8, Valencia Room, Club X, Bergerac, Origin, Butter, as well as Drop84 in Berkeley, and Complex and New Parish in Oakland; SLIC3R is known for his ability to please diverse crowds. Outside of the bay area, SLIC3R has also played in cities such as Tahoe, Reno, and Sacramento. As a resident DJ at Hawthorn in SF, Kipâ€™s in Berkeley, and Motiv in Santa Cruz, you can catch SLIC3R monthly for one of his rock solid sets. This artist has notably supported massive acts such as Red Bull Threestyle champion J. Espinoza and Dim Mak A&R and Sirus XM DJ: Benzi. Dirty Not Sorry, a SF based promotion company and artist collective, is proud to have this well-rounded artist on their roster.
